title: jagadgurO daynidhE
sahitya:
jagadgurO dayAnidhE shrI shankara shivAkrtE


anupallavi

  nigamAgama sAra suguNa nitya shuddha muktulaina


caraNam    ilalO manujuDai puTTi iha paramanE nenaru maraci kuladhana 
nI bhaktilEka unmattuDai tirigitini calacittamugala nA hrttApamulanu 
dIrci brOvu calarahita shrI harikEsha saccidAnandulaina
